mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department_exam (department_id, department_name, exam_id, assign_at) SELECT #{departmentId} as department_id, d.name as department_name, #{examId} as exam_id, NOW() as assign_at FROM departments d WHERE d.id = #{departmentId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM department_exam WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND department_id = #{departmentId}
